title: Help me to find this font placed in a logo, please
author: psyko1981

comments.content: **[Nadianne (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111814/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Agfa&ffam=Nadianne%20-%20Bold&fid=15c87dd53160790c41fcba01b0d9c8f5&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Le%20Blue%20One&fit=1)** by Aldo Novarese [once upon a time published by Agfa, now available from Monotype]

The touch of a master in his prime.  
Don
Agfa also issued a condensed version of Nadianne
